alert.note: Alert for De Kalb (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Allen, southern De Kalb, northwestern Defiance, northwestern Paulding and south central Williams Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 412 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grabill, or 7 miles south of Auburn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... St. Joe around 430 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hicksville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 near mile marker 30. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 315 and 326. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
